sentence.Network_en: They rather had me over the harmonium.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了它,险些儿叫他们逮住了我.

list.abs: He hired a harmonium ., 他租了一架小风琴.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, from Latin harmonia (see harmony) or Greek harmonios 'harmonious'

means.word_mean: 1. a free-reed instrument in which air is forced through the reeds by bellows
